title: Inside a Pro Cyclist’s Supersize Kit Haul: A Ransack of Rapha, Piles of POCs, a Wedge of Wahoos, and More
content:
EF Education-EasyPost rider Harry Sweeny lists all his team-supplied swag for the 2024 season, and there's a hella lot of it.

Read the full article at Inside a Pro Cyclist’s Supersize Kit Haul: A Ransack of Rapha, Piles of POCs, a Wedge of Wahoos, and More on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
